byline.original: By JENNIFER STEINHAUER and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

abstract: Many Democrats believe Pres Obama is not being aggressive enough in confronting terrorist threat of Islamic State in wake of massacre in San Bernardino, Calif.
lead_paragraph: Many of President Obama’s allies in Congress say they do not believe he is being aggressive enough in confronting the Islamic State after last week’s attacks in California.

headline.main: Obama’s Plans to Stop ISIS Leave Many Democrats Wanting More
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Plans to Stop ISIS Leave Many Democrats Wanting More

snippet: Many of President Obama’s allies in Congress say they do not believe he is being aggressive enough in confronting the Islamic State after last week’s attacks in California.
